be.signalsync.syncstrategy

Class CrossCovarianceSyncStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.signalsync.syncstrategy.SyncStrategy
      • be.signalsync.syncstrategy.CrossCovarianceSyncStrategy

  • public class CrossCovarianceSyncStrategy
extends SyncStrategy
    A synchronization strategy which makes use of the Panako fingerprinting algorithm and the crosscovariance algorithm. Some modifications were made to the algorithm to fit this use case.
    Author:
    Joren Six, Ward Van Assche
    See Also:
    http://panako.be

    • Method Detail

      • findLatencies

        public java.util.List<LatencyResult> findLatencies(java.util.List<float[]> slices)
        This method returns a list with all the calculated latencies for each audiostream in comparison with the (first) reference stream.
        Specified by:
        findLatencies in class SyncStrategy
        Parameters:
        slices - A list of slices, each slice is an array of float values. The first slice acts as reference slice in the synchronization.
        Returns:
        A list of latency results for each (non-reference) slice in comparison with the reference slice.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Will be thrown when the slices list is empty.
